meanings.definition: A colorful, loose-fitting garment worn in West Africa.
meanings.sent1: The daishiki was vibrant and comfortable to wear.
meanings.sent2: She bought a daishiki to celebrate African culture.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone admired his daishiki and its bright colors.
meanings.sent4: Her daishiki was like a rainbow flowing through the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The daishiki stood out in the sea of plain shirts.
